---
title: "Logo from extension in subdirectory"
keep-typ: true
format:

_quarto:

    testformat-typst:
      ensureTypstFileRegexMatches:
      -
        - 'image\("\.\.(/|\\\\)_extensions(/|\\\\)testformat(/|\\\\)logo\.svg"'
      -
        - 'image\("\.\.(/|\\\\)\.\.(/|\\\\)_extensions(/|\\\\)testformat(/|\\\\)logo\.svg"'
